Uses of Package
org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.server

  • Packages that use org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.server 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.server  
  • Classes in org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.server used by org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.qjournal.server 
    Class and Description
    JNStorage
    A Storage implementation for the JournalNode.
    Journal
    A JournalNode can manage journals for several clusters at once.
    JournalFaultInjector
    Used for injecting faults in QuorumJournalManager tests.
    JournalMetrics
    The server-side metrics for a journal from the JournalNode's perspective.
    JournalNode
    The JournalNode is a daemon which allows namenodes using the QuorumJournalManager to log and retrieve edits stored remotely.
    JournalNodeHttpServer
    Encapsulates the HTTP server started by the Journal Service.
    JournalNodeMXBean
    This is the JMX management interface for JournalNode information
    JournalNodeRpcServer
